scripts.watch: npm run watch-lib & npm run watch-www & npm run watch-app
scripts.build: npm run build-lib && npm run build-www && npm run build-app
scripts.build-app: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./resources/scripts NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ reactify --es6 ] resources/scripts/app.js | uglifyjs > public/dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build-lib: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./resources/scripts NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ reactify --es6 ] resources/scripts/lib.js | uglifyjs > public/dist/js/lib.min.js
scripts.build-www: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./resources/scripts NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ reactify --es6 ] resources/scripts/www.js | uglifyjs > public/dist/js/www.min.js
